kannada_original: ನಾ ಬರೆದೆ ನಾ ಬರೆದೆ ಎನುತ ಬರಿ ಬೀಗದಿರು
english_transliteration: Nā barede nā barede enuta bari bīgadiru
english_translation: Do not simply boast saying, ""I wrote, I wrote,""
If He listens, He will cause it to be written.
Even in a barren time, if He is pleased, there is a harvest.

kannada_original: ಕೃತಿ ಅವನು, ಲಿಪಿ ನೀನು - ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Kṛti avanu, lipi nīnu - Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: The creation is Him, the script is you – Muddu Rāma.
